UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the Citadel Browser application.

uid.description: The user's unique Firebase Authentication UID.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile image.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public user profile information. The document ID is the user's Firebase Authentication UID.
